title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Card-Based Interactions for Enhancing Literature Quality Assessment Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can systematically analyze the quality of abstracts in scientific research papers based on five evaluation criteria: clarity, methodology, validity, reproducibility, and ethics.
Participants can resolve over 80% of ambiguities arising during literature evaluation through discussions with peers via card-based collaborative activities.
Participants can assess the credibility of work-related literature in digital environments using the PRISMA checklist and classify it into three reliability tiers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
